titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 794 entitled, "A bill for the relief of land grantors in Henderson, Union and Webster counties, Kentucky, and their heirs," to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 204.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 794 (a bill for the relief of land grantors in Henderson, Union, and Webster Counties, Kentucky, and their heirs) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
